_header: All this day Ich had sought / Spindle ne wherve ne fond I nought
Subjects: carols, amorous; domestic life; women, as speakers/narrators
_description: The Serving Maid’s Holiday — ten quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Wybbe ne rele ne spynne yc ne may / For joyȝe þat it ys holyday’

CamGon383.First Lines:
Al þis day ic han soughtSpyndul ne werne ne wond y
                    nouȝt…
CamGon383.Last Lines:
…druȝsty nat min dame telleWat me be tydde þis
                    holyday
